protein.specific_function: Catalyzes two distinct but analogous reactions: the epimerization of UDP-glucose to UDP-galactose and the epimerization of UDP-N-acetylglucosamine to UDP-N-acetylgalactosamine.

pathway.name: Amino sugar and nucleotide sugar metabolism

go_class.description: racemase and epimerase activity, acting on carbohydrates and derivatives
